participant_1.background: i've two grown children who never visit. i fantasize about taking over the world. i'm a 56 year old woman. i used to be a painter but now i am a housekeeper.

participant_2.background: i'm a boy. i can move objects with my mind. i had to have a transplant. i was born with my heart outside my body.

content.text: i do not think you are a painter . i am not sure if i could do that
